description:
Think you can answer?
"How far do reindeer travel when they migrate?"
"Santa only has one female reindeer. Which one is it?"

This skill is fun to play alone, or compete with your family and friends to see who is the master of Reindeer trivia!
name: Reindeer Games
shortDescription: Reindeer Games is a Trivia Game built as a template for developers to use in creating trivia games of their own. It is also fun to play!
